titleStmt.title: The rebellion of the rude multitude under Wat Tyler and his priests Baal and Straw, in the dayes of King Richard the IId, Anno. 1381. Parallel'd with the late rebellion in 1640, against King Charles I of ever blessed memory. / By a lover of his King and countrey.
titleStmt.author: Cleveland, John, 1613-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by J.R. and in Westminster Hall, and at the New Exchange, Fleetstreet, and St. Pauls Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Cleveland. Cf. Wing.
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
